description:
This daypack combines Fjallraven's classic styling with up-to-date recycled and organic materials, and is perfect for every use, day trips while travelling, and relaxed woodland jaunts. Rugged G-1000 Eco fabric is made from recycled polyester and organic cotton and can be treated with their Greenland Wax to enhance its water-resistance. The main compartment is accessed via a long zipper that provides easy viewing of the contents.

  • Made from Fjallraven's G-1000 Eco fabric, a super durable blend of recycled polyester and organically grown cotton with a dense weave
  • Comfortable, lightly padded shoulder straps and back panel
  • Access the large main compartment via the wide clamshell zip
  • Classic Fjallraven logo from 1974
  • Can be treated with Fjallraven's Greenland Wax (sold separately) for greatly increased water resistance
name: Fjallraven Vardag 16 Backpack - Unisex
